# kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyPort | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ CFNetwork ](/documentation/cfnetwork)

- [ kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyPort ](/documentation/CFNetwork/kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyPort)

-  kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyPort 

Global Variable# kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyPort

iOS 2.0–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 2.0–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1DeprecatedmacOS 10.2–10.11DeprecatedtvOS 9.0–9.0DeprecatedvisionOS 1.0–1.0Deprecated

```
let kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyPort: CFString
```

Deprecated

Use NSURLSession API for http requests

## [Discussion](/documentation/CFNetwork/kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyPort#Discussion)

HTTP Proxy Host property. If an HTTP CFStream is using an HTTP proxy, the value of this property is a CFNumber containing the port number of the proxy server.

## [See Also](/documentation/CFNetwork/kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyPort#see-also)
